summary: The best way to predict the future is to invent it. My background is in mechanics and my passion with tangible products best produced in serie. Currently I am working as a Development Lead / Product manager / new business development manager on new technology products for and with customers. My work includes setting strategic direction and vision, defining product definition, prioritizing activities, driving changes, coordinating delivery with key stakeholders (sales, R&D, production) in order to meet customer needs. I play an active role in the scouting of new technology and new leads, converting them to new technical projects. As a project manager I work with our multidisciplinary teams and external parties up to proto phase, after which hand-off to PL takes place. I have many years of process and product development experience, have a black belt, speed MBA, good sense of business and business processes. Besides I connect with people easily and don't mind a laugh now and again :-)
